com.irurueta.units

Enum DistanceUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<DistanceUnit>
      • com.irurueta.units.DistanceUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<DistanceUnit>

    public enum DistanceUnit
extends Enum<DistanceUnit>
    Enumerator containing recognized typical distance units.
